attributes.action: Take on the arrangements for the 10 year rememberance service for Princess Diana
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You did so much for her funeral and now 10 years down the line the people in this country who loved her so very much need to celebrate and commemorate her memory.  We need something bigger than the venue being planned and a change in the persons involved with the service.  We need people who really loved her to be involved in the planning.  What a way to end your ministerial post, Tony - what a way of being remembered by giving the people of this country a say in her memorial service.

rejection.details: Thank you but there is a similar existing petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/dianasservice/ If you still wish to open this petition, please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
